metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17097 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The WavFileBase class in WavFile.cpp in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free) or possibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by SoundStretch. It was discovered that SoundTouch incorrectly handled certain WAV files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: soundtouch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
